Description: Small axe head made of greenish-grey stone with white inclusions, rectangular shape, tapered towards the butt, convex blade end. The front side is smoothed, the back side is eroded and rough. The blade has a sharp edge. A small area at the butt end is chipped off. The section is slightly convex getting thinner towards the blade end.
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 234)
